sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; const commonSkills = [ "Python", "JavaScript", "Java", "C++", "SQL", "HTML", "CSS", "Machine Learning", "Data Analysis", "Web Development", "Mobile Development", "Cloud Computing", "DevOps", "UI/UX Design", "Project Management", "Agile", "Git", "Docker", "Kubernetes", "AWS", "Azure", "Google Cloud", "React", "Node.js", "Express", "Django", "Flask", "Spring Boot", "MongoDB", "PostgreSQL", "MySQL", "Redis", "GraphQL", "REST APIs", "Data Structures", "Algorithms", "System Design", "Network Security", "Cybersecurity", "Blockchain", "IoT", "AR/VR", "Game Development", ]; const interestAreas = [ "Engineering", "Computer Science", "Data Science", "Business", "Healthcare", "Arts & Design", "Education", "Finance", "Marketing", "Law", "Medicine", "Research", "Environmental Science", "Social Sciences", "Humanities", "Architecture", "Agriculture", "Manufacturing", "Transportation", "Energy & Utilities", ]; const InputSection = ({ onPredict, loading }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ skills: "", interests: "", education: "", experience: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onPredict(formData); }; return (
